section.name: Cache Aspects - Limitations
section.subsection:
Building the aspects with Eclipse may show unit test failures. This depends on how the Eclipse projects was created. In order for the Aspects to work they must be compiled in by the Maven AspectJ plugin. If you wish to test the actual aspects in Eclipse then I'd recommend the AJDT plugin. You may also need to build with maven then run the tests in Eclipse.
The issue is that a normal Eclipse build does not apply aspects.
